website_summaries.verdict: This resilient tire holds up well on rough city streets and racks up mileage gracefully, but it is on the heavy side.
pros: Service life is well above the 500 to 600 miles of other road tires
cons: Tend to be heavier than other road tires
Installation can be a bit tricky
Tends to fail at the sidewalls rather than the treads

customer_reviews.title: Great, but a beast to get on rims!
customer_reviews.text: Oh, they're great "tough" tires, but they are the Devil to put on rims...The side walls are so stiff! I switched from a set of Kendra (152 ?) that had over 3K miles in them (and still have life to go) to GatorSkins for a century ride... I put pinch leaks in a set of tubes before I got the next set of tubes in safe. Bought them for the durability, but will go back to a more normal tire, that I can manipulate easier, with less risk to the tubes.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Durable tires for poor road conditions
customer_reviews.text: I ride a lot of roads that are chip seal and have plenty of rocks and other debris. Gatorskins are tough and greatly reduce the number of flats. They are tough and last me approx 5000 miles of aggressive riding. They would last longer but I replace them early to avoid flats.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Tough to beat Bike Tires
customer_reviews.text: I ride a road bike and over the last eight years the Continental has become my tire of choice. On my last set not one flat tire, they just ran thin after thousands of miles. Most of the riders in my bike group ride these tires, they are very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Castorena

customer_reviews.title: I had at least four thousand miles on my last set without a flat
customer_reviews.text: Hope to get anywhere near the same use out of these. I only replaced the last set due to age, keeping as spares.
customer_reviews.author: Robert K.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tires!
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from 23 to 28 and could not be any happier. These tires are awesome and your ride is so much comfortable. Love them!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cesar A. Sosa

customer_reviews.title: Gatorskins live up to their name!
customer_reviews.text: Tires arrived on time and installed without issue. I have 200+ miles with zero flats so I'm very happy so far. My route goes through several miles in goat head territory and flats were a weekly event, so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived as advertised
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Great price and came exactly as advertised. Wonderful product and this is a great price for a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Bibbs

customer_reviews.title: Best Road Bike flat prevention tire
customer_reviews.text: Great to Best Buy for street road bike long distance riders preventing most nuisance sharp object penatration. Best Buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not flat resistant
customer_reviews.text: This tire is no better than a tire half it’s price . I’ve had one flat in first 5miles and 2 more in the last 200 miles. Don’t buy expecting less flats. Most of my riding is on well paved roads with a bike lane in Naples FL
customer_reviews.author: bikrwalt

customer_reviews.title: Great tires.
customer_reviews.text: Love these tires. Been riding on them for 5 years or so. I usually switch them out yearly or 400 to 800 miles.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Been riding with my gator skins for a month or so, no issues!
customer_reviews.author: L. Fiecke

customer_reviews.title: Bead too small for most wheels
customer_reviews.text: The bead is way too small, i had to use a metal screw driver to get it on after 15 min of fighting. Why make it so small?!?!
customer_reviews.author: isaac

customer_reviews.title: Well built tire that has been performing well since installation ...
customer_reviews.text: Well built tire that has been performing well since installation. Went from 23mm to 25mm with no issues. Tire provides smooth ride on the trail.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty, but good road feel
customer_reviews.text: These tires are great. Very heavy duty, but sill a nice road feel. Very hard to get on and off the rim though. Be prepared to apply some elbow grease. First ride was the 5 Boros New York, on some nasty roads, passing people on shoulders littered with glass and junk. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: H. A. Newness

customer_reviews.title: Great tires
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten these tires before and they have really impressed with their resilience and durability. Although I've only just put this set on they seem to be working out ok so far.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kado

customer_reviews.title: Great tire
customer_reviews.text: Best puncture resistant tire I have ever used. They wear extremely well. These combined with some Stan's No Tube in the tube, and I have never had a flat. I commute daily, and also use these for my long distance century rides.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne JK

customer_reviews.title: Kinda disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: They are not as puncture resistance as I hope. Two flat in 600 miles ride. Kinda disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Tran

customer_reviews.title: Pin holes in tread
customer_reviews.text: Gatorskin tires look great and have been working fine. I am worried that the two holes in the top surface are going to cause a future leak one day. It's like the tires had an air bubble in them during manufacture. I would send back but I don't have a tire to put on and i need the tires currently due to training for a race.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Great resistent tyres
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tyres since they are are strong, durable and great breaking
customer_reviews.author: rodrigo guerra

customer_reviews.title: Unmountable
customer_reviews.text: I have been riding on Gatorskins for years. They are on 3 of my bikes. However, the last pair I bought from Amazon to go on a new bike, they could not be mounted. I have been working with tires for years , I used everything I could think of, tire levers, greasee on the rim, even an extra pair of hands. I could not get the tire mounted on a 700 rim. As I was trying to leverage the tire onto the rim I thought: "What would happen if I were on the road and had to fix a flat? Needless to say these tires are out of spec so I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Illini62

customer_reviews.title: Poor Design
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy these. You can't take them off. Oh sure, someone can eventually, but realistically, you can't take them off. There are other tires, like the continental (formerly armadillo?) tires that are just as puncture resistant, that you can actually take off. But you can't take these off. There's no reason to design them so #$#%@ hard to remove, but they basically can't be removed. You have to be able to remove the tires. But these can't be removed. DON'T BUY!
customer_reviews.author: J. Becker

customer_reviews.title: Great Tire, would by again over and over.
customer_reviews.text: I must say this is the best tire I have used so far. I put these tires on last July(2016) and I have put 5,000 miles on these tires with no problems what so ever, not even a flat. I have ridden these tires on multiple types of pavement and they ride well. I would highly recommend these tires if you are looking for a high milage tire that is durable. They are a little heavier than some tires but the rewards are greater than the failures. John, Alabama
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: The money I save on replacing tubes/CO2 cartridges far outweighs the cost of these tires. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Del Mar

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Sidewalk ruptured and jagged bead wire ripped into ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Sidewalk ruptured and jagged bead wire ripped into the tube. 3rd ride.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought these tires and got a flat tire after ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these tires and got a flat tire after using them for just under a week. I had had them professionally installed because I had gotten 4 flat tires in the space of four weeks. These tires are supposed to withstand slight punctures. Unfortunately that wasn't the case. Since then I haven't gotten another flat (2 months later) but the name GatorSkin is definitely misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tires!
customer_reviews.text: Great tires! I use them for training on my Computrainer and for long road rides/commuting in Chicago. No flats. I’ve had this set on my bike for two years.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago cyclist

product_meta.title: Continental GatorSkin DuraSkin Tire 2-Pack
product_meta.description: High mileage and puncture resistance team up in this fast-rolling, wire bead road tire from Continental. Made with DuraSkin polyamide fabric to ensure excellent sidewall protection without compromising weight or ride quality. Smooth in the center and grippy on the shoulders, this durable tire provides superior cornering in any condition. Designed for bike commuting, touring and serious training. The Continental Gatorskin wire bead road tire is made with DuraSkin polyamide fabric to ensure excellent sidewall protection without compromising weight or ride quality Smooth in the center and grippy on the shoulders, this durable road bicycle tire provides superior cornering in any condition Designed for bike commuting, cycle touring and serious cycing training
feature_bullets: Kevlar belt under the tread for cut and puncture protection
DuraSkin fabric makes this one long lasting tire
THE only tyre for your winter / high mileage bike
Please Note: Product tag may be labeled as "Ultra Gatorskin"

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
